class_trainer Module¶

ClassTrainer class uses several classification models.

CIFAR10-classification¶

Model

Accuracy for CIFAR10

VGG16 1

92.64%

ResNet18 2

93.02%

ResNet50 2

93.62%

ResNet101 2

93.75%

RegNetX_200MF 3

94.24%

RegNetY_400MF 3

94.29%

MobileNetV2 4

94.43%

ResNeXt29(32x4d) 5

94.73%

ResNeXt29(2x64d) 5

94.82%

SimpleDLA 9

94.89%

DenseNet121 6

95.04%

PreActResNet18 7

95.11%

DPN92 8

95.16%

DLA 10

95.47%
